mapper.update: insert into moim (mid, mname, category, maxmember, createdate, intro, mopicture, mspicture, msfolder) values (moim_seq.nextval, #{mname}, #{category}, #{maxmember}, sysdate, #{intro}, #{mopicture}, #{mspicture}, #{msfolder})
insert into moimmember (id, mid, grade, nick) values (#{id}, moim_seq.currval, 0, 'master')
mapper.select: select * from moim where mid in ( select mid from moimmember where id=#{id} ) order by mid
select * from moim order by mid
select * from moim where mname like '%'||#{sword}||'%' order by mid
